Sequence Information.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from HSV-1 B glycoprotein (gB))
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.19104014]Herpes simplex virus type 1(HSV-1):comprehensive antiviral activity(EC50=34.9 ± 1.8 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Multiple peptides homologous to herpes simplex virus type 1 glycoprotein B inhibit viral infection.
Literature.Author: Akkarawongsa R, Pocaro NE, Case G, Kolb AW, Brandt CR.
